General.Name: Beijing Utour International Travel Service Co Ltd
General.Description: UTour Group Co., Ltd. engages in outbound tourism wholesale and retail business in China and internationally. It provides study tours, immigration and real estate, tourism finance, health care, etc., and air ticket sales agency services. The company also provides integrated marketing; investment and asset management; currency exchange; internet financial information; and monetary financial services. It operates through a network of 737 retail stores. The company was formerly known as Beijing UTour International Travel Service Co., Ltd. and changed its name to UTour Group Co., Ltd. in July 2016. UTour Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 8 Chaoyang Park Road, Beijing, China, 100125

4.Name: Mr. Feng  Wang
